entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:44 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: W 15 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
